title: Rail Europe Special Offer On Italian High Speed Rail Travel
text:
Rail Europe, Inc.
Travelers Receive $10 Amazon.com Gift Card for Each Eligible Booking on RailEurope.com
WHITE PLAINS, N.Y. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Rail Europe, Inc. , the largest distributor of European rail products in North America , announces a special deal on First Class Trenitalia tickets. Travelers who book a First Class domestic Trenitalia ticket by November 3, 2015 will receive a free $10 Amazon.com gift card*, perfect to use for purchases on guidebooks, international adaptors, luggage and more.
Trenitalia's high speed trains reach more than 200 stations each day, including popular destinations like Rome , Milan , Florence , and Venice as well as Italy's secondary destinations, such as Naples , Bologna, Verona and Cinque Terre. With the high speed comfort of Italian rail and the ease of rail travel, travelers will breeze on Italy's Trenitalia trains from Rome to Florence in a mere ninety minutes or from Milan to Venice in less than three hours. Trenitalia is introducing a new fleet of trains - Frecciarossa 1000 - with a rollout that began earlier this year and is scheduled to be completed in 2016.
No matter the route, Trenitalia first class cars indulge and pamper the traveler at every level. Amenities include access to power outlets, spacious seating, welcome drink and savory snack, as well as a bar-buffet car offering a complete selection of food and beverages for purchase.
Bookings can be made by visiting Rail Europe's website at raileurope.com . Rail Europe's local travel experts with extensive European knowledge are also available by phone to answer any questions about upcoming travel and help with bookings.
*Online bookings made on www.raileurope.com or www.raileurope.ca that include first class domestic Trenitalia train tickets made from October 20, 2015 through 5:00pm ET on November 3, 2015 will be eligible for a $10 Amazon.com ® Gift Card in the US or Amazon.ca ® Gift Certificate in Canada . Trenitalia domestic train tickets show in "Premier Class" and/or "Comfort Class" on the Rail Europe websites. Upon the awarding of the first 1158 Amazon.com Gift Cards/ Amazon.ca Gift Certificates, or until the promotion's end date at 5:00 pm ET on November 3, 2015 , whichever comes first, the promotion for the Gift Card/Certificate will end immediately. Only the first 1158 bookings that qualify will be notified via email with the gift card/certificate. In the event the booking is cancelled the Amazon.com Gift Cards or Amazon.ca Gift Certificates shall be forfeited. This offer applies only to bookings that travel is completed. Please allow 6-8 weeks to receive your Amazon.com Gift Cards or Amazon.ca Gift Certificates by email. International Trenitalia tickets are excluded from this offer.
In the United States the Gift Card will be an Amazon.com Gift Card, delivered via email. In Canada the Gift Certificate will be an Amazon.ca Gift Certificate, delivered via email. Gift card offer is not valid in Mexico .
Amazon.com and Amazon.ca are not sponsors of this promotion.

Amazon.ca Gift Certificates must be redeemed through the Amazon.ca Web site, toward the purchase of eligible products. Gift Certificates may not be redeemed for the purchase of products through in-store pickup, or at Amazon.com , Amazon.co.uk , Amazon.de , Amazon.fr , Amazon.co.jp , Amazon.it , Amazon.es , or any other Web site operated by Amazon.com , its affiliates, or any other person or entity. About Rail Europe, Inc.
Rail Europe represents more than 50 European train companies and is a one-stop shop for European rail travel planning and booking. Rail Europe, Inc. is the largest distributor of European rail products in North America , offering a wide range of passes and train tickets to North American travelers. An essential part of the vacation planning process, the company's Web site offers a user-friendly booking engine, knowledgeable experts, online rail pass finder, virtual tours, interactive maps and much more. Rail Europe provides a worry-free, cost and time-effective and seamless travel experience by enabling customers to purchase tickets and plan travel details in advance.
For more information or to book a trip with Rail Europe, visit raileurope.com . Trips can also be reserved by consulting with a travel agent or calling 1-888-382-7245 (U.S.). To book rail for groups of 10 or more, please contact the Group Department at raileurope.com/group-travel/group-travel.html .
For the latest Rail Europe news, downloadable videos and high-resolution photos of European trains, media can visit the newsroom at http://www.multivu.com/players/English/7157831-rail-europe-inc-newsroom/ .
